intro: Clemensiella viracensis, commonly known as the Viracensis clemensiella, is a rare flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, which includes a wide variety of orchids. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically bloom in shades of white and pale pink. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, often found in tropical rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
